author: Frank Thomas
text: Does anyone have a request for proposals to lease space on an elevated water tank for broadband or other antennas? We are looking to enhance or revenue and feel this would be appropriate in our area.
title: Elevated Water Tower RFP to lease space for broadband/cellular antenna
